website_summaries.verdict: This very wide gate does a good job in open concept areas of dividing a living space and restricting access for baby or pets.
pros: Can block a double staircase effectively Has the ability to angle to different configurations for your space needs
The panel lengths on each side are adjustable
Can be used as a freestanding play yard if needed
cons: The wall mounts that come with this extra large baby gate could be better

customer_reviews.title: Potential choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: We have had this gate for a week, while my LO is only 10 months old she was able to rock the gate hard enough back and forth maybe an inch to break the plastic piece at the bottom that stops the gate from swinging all the way through. She swallowed it, and passed it thankfully. This is a design flaw, you should not have a piece of plastic hitting a piece of metal. The company was very nice/concerned and did issue us a refund, and is passing the broken gate over to their quality control team, but a gate designed to keep babies away from choking hazards should not be so easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Penn

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Safe zone for sure for your little ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Safe zone for sure for your little one. Especially at their crawling stage. I bought 2 of these to make it this big and wide. He has plenty of space to crawl around and play. And it’s easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: In love with it!!! It can almost double in its size. Perfect for odd shaped openings. I ordered one for my daycare, it came in one day even though it said it would take 2. And I just received it an hour ago and have already ordered a second one for an area I didn't think I could find one to fit in. Forgive the mess, I'm organizing storage space now. Our daycare opens in a week so it's a little unorganized right now
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Jones

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 sets - connecting it wasn't easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets (at different times) , connecting both sets together wasn't easy. The connectors does not connect with each other right off the bat, not to mention that they come in 2 different heights at the bottom. The top ones align properly, but the bottom ones don't. I got fed up with trying to figure out how to flip things around, so I just zip tied together what didn't connect properly. However, for the price, I shouldn't have to use zip ties to make things work. Connecting the pieces should be more flexible, so that we can buy more sets down the road. I'm disappointed overall, and will look for other options for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: joyce peng

customer_reviews.title: *One star Update* Gate welding/soldering broke
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** After less than 4 months of use, the gate broke and make this totally useless. The welding, or soldering, on one of the main, outer support poles simply detached and broke. It is the main vertical support closest to the hinge on the gate/door part. Now this is completely unusable. This is so versatile! No need for cumbersome additional extensions because the two side panels slide and lock at the right length. We're using this around our front door to keep our new puppy from running out the front door as my kids come in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Winton

customer_reviews.title: Great gate
customer_reviews.text: We have a large opening in our home and this baby gate is great. Our son is a head banger and the mesh helps him not get hurt. My husband has an easy time attaching it to the walls and it doesn’t wiggle when weight is pushed into it. I do not like the locking mechanism though. It has to be very deliberately closed to insure that the lock is all the way secure. It’s easy to open one handily but closing it isn’t as easy. It can half way lock and if it’s pushed on it’ll open. I would still recommend this gate but you just have to make sure it’s actually locked.
customer_reviews.author: Swiggle

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it came with a template for where to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. But its a bit flimsy for my liking. I liked that it came with a template for where to place the screws. I just wish it was a bit more sturdy. Doors easy to open as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eureka Smith

customer_reviews.title: I'd return if I didn't need such a long fence
customer_reviews.text: We were limited on the fence we could get because the space we need to block is large so we went with this one. The template that comes with it to show where to put the screws does not take the baseboard into account so we now have unwanted holes in our walls. If you don't have the fence stretched out to the largest the mesh bunches up and looks terrible. I have another Summer infant gate that I like and it isn't too difficult to use, this one however is a pain to get closed so it's not a quick exit of the room when a child is trying to push through.
customer_reviews.author: Disney Mama

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! LOVE IT! 😍
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this gate for our large kitchen opening to keep our very busy 11 month old out of the kitchen. We've had this for a few months now and with kids pulling on it, going in and out, kitchen remodel...its held up perfectly. I'd definitely buy again and would tell everyone to get this. You can use 2 or 3 of the sections. Bend to any size. Easy to unhook from the wall and fold up when we have parties and don't need it up. Our 8 year old has no problem opening or closing the gate. It's pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great gate, needs some sticky pads
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gate. I have it across a 10 foot span blocking our dining room. Each end is screwed directly into the studs so it isn't going anywhere, important as my 1 year old tries to climb it regularly. My only recommendation is if you have hard tile floors - which I do - you will want to put some 3M sticky stuff under the feet by the gate. Otherwise, it slides back and forth a bit, enough to allow the gate to be popped opened. Probably not an issue if you have carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Don K.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly in the center, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: So the ends are sturdy and assembly/installation wasn’t that bad. The issue I have is the door/center of the gate is very wobbly. From day one, it doesn’t close perfectly, it’s very cheap. It shakes/leans very easily if my toddler leans on it (yes we tell him not to!). There is no option for the door to stay open, it’s an automatic close.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a dream! Works against my beast! My son is HUGE and can bulldoze himself out of anything! Even this, he eventually pulled it out of our wall but we ended up nailing it back into the wall, into a piece of wood! Not what we wanted to do, but like I said, he bulldozes! He’s not even 17 months and over 30 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: JILLIAN

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the headache and pay for better quality. If you are attaching the three panel to a wall it is not sturdy at all! Besides the fact that the door does not line up to lock shut properly whenever you open the door the whole gate moves. I will say it looks nice but ofcourse once using it you realize looks aren’t everything.
customer_reviews.author: jacjac23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to block off my kitchen from my child. The mesh makes it easy for her to see me still while safely keeping her away. The joints aren't as sturdy as I would hope, meaning if my child leans on it or pushes they bend and I have to straighten it out again, but it is still a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Works, but latch isnt super strong
customer_reviews.text: If you want to keep animals out of an area and have a big doorway, this is for you. However, my 11 month old figured out the latch pretty quickly. Maybe he is related to Tommy Pickle, or maybe the latch needs some tweaking. It was easy to install in the 9 foot doorway between our living room and dining room/kitchen. Only took a few minutes. We use an aditional child safety latch made for cupboards to keep my son out. Keeps the dogs out as well. I wish the latch was stronger, and we didn't have to use something else, other than that we'll built and by far the cheapest gate you can get for a large doorway.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: Covers the wide doorway.
customer_reviews.text: Finally an adjustable gate for my oversized doorway! Yes, Hou Dini has, with a great deal of effort, found ways to bounce it out of place and get out .but my little shih tzu finds it a much greater challenge than any ofher barrier we have tried. It was well worth the price. My dog is 6 lbs -don't expect this to hold up to a toddler or larger dog. I use the gate and 1 section together and just the adjustable piece on another doorway with improvised anchors. I wish this had a way to use pressure anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Texas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job OK
customer_reviews.text: We use this for a large opening to keep the dogs off the carpet. It serves it’s purpose, but is a little flimsy, it got the gate bent within a couple days so it no longer latches even. And even before being bent it’s kinda a pain to latch. Other than that we are very happy, and it comes with plenty of different accessories to mount it in diverse ways.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H

customer_reviews.title: Harder for todlers to open than other gates.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gate to block off my living room. My 14month old son can't open this gate but he can open grandmas and the gate at day care. Other gates are simply a push button to unlock the gate; which kids figure out quickly. This gate is a push and slide to open. You need to apply a little pressure to slide. I am supper happy with my choice. It is very sturdy. Ours is configured with 2 panels (gate and 1 side panel) at 68 inches. He bangs and pushes on it. No issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for puppy containment.
customer_reviews.text: We got this gate as a back up when the first gate I ordered didnt come on time. We liked this one so much we decided to keep it an sent the othet gate back whem it finally arrived. It is light and portable and easy for me to move around where I need it. We got it to keep oir puppy contained and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: massage08

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: It clearly says on the ad several times that this is 143 inches. But the box and instructions say 141. Now I have to install trim pieces to make it work which will also involves paint and a lot more of my time than I wanted to spend on this silly thing. If I could give it zero stars for false advertising I would.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Delivered and installed today. Very simple and exactly what I needed. Cost was appropriate especially since most other gates were closer to $100 and too small. I will probably be buying another panel or two to use in other areas of the house (need to gate off a fish tank and don't need a gate to it just a panel). Just one concern that it appears the twins may be able to push the panels around with the angles on how we have it set. By the way, we mounted it to the couch :)
customer_reviews.author: Desi Conner

customer_reviews.title: **Exactly what we needed**
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to install. The door is easy to open and close(for adults). It was between this and one of those black metal ones, and I'm really glad I got this one because the panels are adjustable. It's really easy to open up( for moving furniture or whatever) without having to dissassmble alot of pieces and parts. I went ahead and got the warranty as well
customer_reviews.author: Boobookitty

customer_reviews.title: Dont wait, buy it
customer_reviews.text: So we had 2 attached to block off a large area of our house the last several years. It worked great. But we recently dogsat and this person's dog chewed through the mesh ugh. So we had to buy another to replace it. Love these gates. Totally worth the money for us. I cant imagine life without them lol seriously.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyAcct

customer_reviews.title: Was Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Update 02/26/19 after 2yrs 5months the gate had enough and broke 🙁 _____________________________________ I am on #3 for these gates. The first one I bought used and loved it except for how it wore out with the plastic tabs eventually breaking off maybe because of age and the same metal bar on 2 of the gates the weld eventually broke too but was still usable so maybe jbweld would fix that or the company should work on that. Otherwise they work great for expanding large rooms and I haven't found anything comparable.
customer_reviews.author: RTalb10

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what we needed! It had survived ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed! It had survived my 5 kids for a while now, it is mounted across my 11ft entryway, to keep my 2 youngest in the living room. Once the wood burning stove is no longer in use, I plan on moving this to block off the front door/kitchen. The only complaint I have is the latch mechanism on the door doesn't fully line up all the time and honestly is a real pain in the butt. I think of they were to redesign it, this would be worth the $86 I shelled out for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: And the gates are very sturdy. I wish I had been able to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these gates that was given to me. I wanted to extend a portion of the room that I wanted blocked off so we bought another. I connected the two gates and mounted each end to the wall. Now I can block off a huge section of the room but I can also contract it a small portion of the room if I need to. So convenient! And the gates are very sturdy. I wish I had been able to get the same color but unfortunately I wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: It is not sturdy except on each side where it is mounted into the wall. The feet on both sides of the gate slide allowing the gate to move back and forth by small children and small pets. This causes the gate to get off track and won't close properly without several attempts to get it back on track. My grandchildren just learning to walk fall down because they grab hold of the top rail and then the gate moves so quickly. The feet should have something on the bottom to stop them from sliding all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT EXPAND TO 143”!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I couldn’t even install the gate because the site advertises 143” but the box and the actual gate only accommodate to about 141” at best. The opening we have is 142” and we still had over an inch of space even with the wall attachments on. I love this brand and loved the idea of not having to jump over the play yard fencing we have now, but I’ll have to find something else. Very disappointed in the false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Tamatha

customer_reviews.title: Not as modular as they make it sound.
customer_reviews.text: If you want the door in the middle, this thing is fine. Because of the talking of adding panels I assumed I coukd put the door where I need it. I can't. It's middle or nothing because of the design. I wish I had bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Derek & Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for hard to fit space.
customer_reviews.text: We have a large open floorplan and these have been great between the columns of our dining room. However one of our three gates arrived with something made not well. The frame was bent or made poorly in a way that it could not be fitted on the parts in the wall. We returned the one and put another in its place and it fit perfectly. Quick & easy return too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Romano

customer_reviews.title: Modification needed
customer_reviews.text: This gate is okay, I had an 80" opening that made it very difficult to find a gate. Whoever designed this gate wasn't a very bright person. There is no need to have 2 different mounting locations. One way works great because the hinges are higher than molding, and most homes have molding. The only way for me to make it work was to use 3 panels so it would mount properly. Even after I installed it longer than needed, and against the walls, it was still very flimsy until I used some tube clamps to mount it to a stud. Now it is solid as a rock and will not break.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh, just “OK”
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little flimsy in that it can move (slide across the floor) quite a bit (up to a foot I’d say) if you push up against it and even the locking mechanism is a bit flimsy. If you push hard against it, it will come loose. So far, our little one hasnt busted through it, but we have only had it one day (fingers crossed). We have a wide door ooening that requires a product like this, so I suppose the “sliding” factor might occur on all of them, not sure. Would prefer to have one that was rigid and did not move (even after screwing it in the wall)
customer_reviews.author: Bert G Dickey IV

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and modern and very easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: I have a very big entrance for my kitchen and the staircase is inside the kitchen. I bought this and didn't have both hopes. I was wrong it's a large gate and it's a soft mesh but yet durable enough that my son pushes and pushes on but has not made and holes. The only downside is that it is bolted to the wall so some holes in the wall are required but it's a small price to pay for safety. It looks nice and modern and very easy to open and close
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Bends and stretches to fit the space
customer_reviews.text: Not only do the bigger pieces readjust to scruntch and stretch, but you can put everything at an angle or even make a little kiddie jail if need be. My niece loves to pull herself up on this gate, but it holds strong. Get used to how you clip the door back in, though, because if its not fully closed it will swing open with just a little pressure. The dog taught us that...
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Not a very durable baby gate, especially for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 6 months before it was basically ripped out of the wall, now we’re left with big holes instead. Our daughter will grab the top and shake it when she wants to get past and even though we catch her most of the time it obviously doesn’t stand up well to normal toddler wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: but it's not great looking if you have to fit a space that ...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda lukewarm on this thing. It definitely gets the job done, but it's not great looking if you have to fit a space that requires the fabric to be scrunched up. Also it's pretty flimsy and has a lot of "wiggle room" no matter how tight we get it (though we have it installed over tile, and the feet would probably hold it steadier on carpet), and the door is a bit of a pain to close. Overall feeling, it gets the job done but I'll be happy when we don't need it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in blocking off our large space
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in blocking off our large space. Only drawback is the mesh fabric hangs slack if you do not use the full width. Not great for a super mobile toddler. I thought originally the slack would be somehow rolled up into the frame - this would make the design perfect. Make sure you secure it into studs or use strong anchors so it doesn’t budge!
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases of 2017
customer_reviews.text: I only wish the joints were stronger so you could keep it one straight line. My kids keep pushing the gate and it makes different shapes. Just the OCD in me. Else this was one of the best things I ever bought. We have a large opening between the living room and dining area that other gates just wouldn't reach. This did the trick and made our lives so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: JustPeachyT

customer_reviews.title: Nope- keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The "gate" latch is hardly beyond a small toddler's ability to open, it can be pushed and manipulated, and the material itself breaks over time. In our case, the base of the gate is made of plastic and within a few short weeks had already broken off. Would not recommend to someone looking to purchase a sturdy and reliable gate. We will more than likely purchase a different brand to replace this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that my two year old son is a bit of a Houdini, so I wasn't surprised that it didn't take him long to learn how to open this gate. It is installed across a wide doorway using two panels, he simply pulls the hinge joint, which pops the gate open and then he is gone. I am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SKryB

customer_reviews.title: Gate looks flimsy but it works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Act very flimsy but it actually works very well and looks very stylish. I purchased this gate and the Munchkin Easy-Close Extra Tall and Wide Metal Gate, Dark Grey. This gate is adjustable to fit different lengths (both side panels has adjusting locks that you can use to set the length). It only took about 30 minutes to read the instructions and complete the installation of this gate. I have this product for about 1 year already and it still acts intended. My child is very tall, loves climbing and yet she cannot climb this gate. I ended up returning the Munchkin gate as it is more difficult to install the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 14 month old can open it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very pleased with this gate... then my 14 month old figured out how to open it. Now its useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better gates for large openings, but still not ideal. The angle locks meant to hold the gate's joints are pretty useless. The floor underneath is really scratched up from this gate, my toddler and dogs can push it and it moves several feet. Stronger locks would prevent that. Otherwise, it's a decent gate. I have bought it several times due to the material not holding up to my dogs...but still is better than the metal gate we tried.
customer_reviews.author: LBryan

customer_reviews.title: Easier than expected installation, decent gate.
customer_reviews.text: Installation on these gates usually scares me but this was fairly easy. Follow directions and tape the measuring paper exactly right or your holes will be all askew. My only complaint is that once it's installed, a toddler can still stretch the gate to a larger size and it will move a few inches in each direction. There should be a way to lock the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, awful durability
customer_reviews.text: We have had this gate for about a year and at first it was amazing. As my son became a more active toddler, it needed to be tightened and adjusted regularly. Then, the door completely fell apart. The soldered parts have separated leaving the gate both useless and a safety hazard. The concept is great but the durability is definitely an area that needs improvement to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this gate, it keeps my kids and dogs safe. Easy to put together, What I enjoy the most about the gate is that you could add on more gate or you could remove parts and the gate so it fits in any good size area. But most of all I appreciate Amazon and your employees for working through this tough time, stay safe and Thank Yous😊
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Very customizable and very durable! Sleek look to it also!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because this was the only gate I could custom fit to the angle I needed to block off. This gate has been beaten on. Rammed I to. Scratches by dogs. My baby constantly bounces off of it like wrestling ropes haha. Very impressed with the durability and simplicity to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner B

customer_reviews.title: Choking Hazard Concerns
customer_reviews.text: Two choking hazard sized pieces of plastic broke off of this gate, at least one of which was sitting at the bottom of the box it was packed in. These pieces came from the lower latches that connect one piece of the gate to another. We immediately packed it up and are sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Welding on gate broke and moves a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this gate for 5 months and the welding has broke on the gate. The gate has been thrown away and I had to buy something else. I loved it at first but then it started moving a lot I would tighten it and it would loosen up and finally broke. I wouldn't recommend if used on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mounts to wall are fine, but doesn't really stay in place on floor
customer_reviews.text: Mounts to wall are fine, but doesn't really stay in place on floor, so it will slide around. Door broke on it just a little over a month after purchase. This was with fairly normal wear and tear. Door will lock in place but not swing with hitting the floor, so it now requires two hands to go through gate. This isn't easy when holding a baby or laundry in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarveza

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gate I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This gate is great. Extra large and flexible. I have had it in four different houses now with different types of floor plans and it has worked for all of them. It mounts in the walls and is sturdy so even my toddler who likes to push against it, doesn’t fall down the stairs :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gates!
customer_reviews.text: We did not install it per se. We are using one upstairs and one downstairs to block the stairs. They work perfectly. Just lock the joints and our daughter can't slide either. They've been in use for at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Canty

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these gates and they are the best gates i have bought they look nice as well.. i would suggest buying one for your little ones..
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect and just as described. Also, customer service is amazing! One side came defective and it was replaced promptly. Perfect for the dogs and kids :) Sturdy as it has stood up to my little maltipoo chihuaha trying to tear it up.
customer_reviews.author: GloWorm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large spaces and openings!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this gate. We needed to find one for a large entryway and were having a difficult time, this fit perfectly and adjusts very easily. It is very sturdy however I'm not a huge fan on the mesh siding and unsure how well that will hold up in the long run but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jamiee

customer_reviews.title: This one fits perfect and it isn't even extended all the way
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that would block stairs and a door to our basement. It was incredibly hard to find gates to fit this area. This one fits perfect and it isn't even extended all the way. Only reason I took a star off is because of the latch, it can be a little bit of a hassle to close, nothing major just have had gates that are easier. Overall very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Hatchett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Sturdy & Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for awhile now, and it’s exactly what I’d hoped for. Covers a long space, very sturdy, and my above average height toddler can’t climb it or figure out the latch. Super easy to set up! My hubs had it done in less than fifteen minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Best gate EVER
customer_reviews.text: This gate is great! It fits the large, awkward space between the kitchen and living room. Set up was simple too. I love the template to help guide where the screws go. Everything came out even.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected at all. I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected at all. I thought it turned in to a play yard but dose not. You have to have 2 of them in order for it to. The gate Gets stuck have to jiggle it to get it to latch correctly. It dose it purpose but is not what i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Courtlb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gate for that extra wide opening. Open and close is smooth and not too easy for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: hdw

customer_reviews.title: Works well, serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works well, serves the purpose we bought it for, keeping the dogs out of the carpeted areas. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mckymse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for big opening stairs. Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This gate fit perfectly for the bottom opening of my staircase. It has saved us heartache time and time again. It does require set up, medium difficulty set up. Literally a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: We like the length of this gate and the fact that it is mesh. However the top lock of the door broke within a week of use. We are now waiting till our LO figures out how to open it without the lock.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a pellet stove I need to keep my nephews away from. The gate hardware is cheap plastic and doesn't work properly, you need two hands to close it in order to make sure it latches securely. I'm unimpressed for the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Versatile.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: So versatile. We have used this in two different forms/ways in two separate areas of our house. The versatility is brilliant and it's not bad looking in our mostly gray & white home. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KKDR

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our wonky space
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our wonky space. We wanted to create a makeshift "mudroom" that kept our toddler out of the shoes and away from the garage door. This was perfect! Being able to create the shape with the three sections was exactly what we were looking for in a gate. It also can be easily opened one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: The gate was so easy to install, it took only 25 minutes! We were surprised at how easy it was. And how durable and sturdy it is. My 8 month old recently learned how to pull themselves up and the gate is still holding strong, despite the fact a baby is swinging from it 90% of the time. I would recommend this gate over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Caez

customer_reviews.title: Great for all sized areas
customer_reviews.text: I love this gate! We got it because our little one started crawling. We use it in a 103" opening from our living room to our dining room. It's adjustable and allows us to change the setup in the same space. Easy to open and close and does exactly what we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica George

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for awkward spaces
customer_reviews.text: We needed a gate for an awkward entry area with stairs and a living room. The stair rail is iron so we couldn't put in a traditional gate because it couldn't hook onto the thin metal rail. This gate worked perfectly for our awkward space.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Check measurements
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because a family member had it and loved it! Briefly read the description and clicked "buy now", once i received the package and started putting things together i realized it was to short for the space needed. I was so upset i had to return it because its very well built and still makes a home look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Too easy to open
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, seems like it functions nice, but doesn't work for toddlers. My 2 year old figured out how to open it in less than 5 minutes. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gate!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to block off our garage so the dogs couldnt get out if we were in there watching the game. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great play area
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go with another gate I have to make a play area. It was super easy to install and makes a great play area. It holds up when baby pushes against it. I havent tried it mounted as a standard gate. The door us pretty easy to open, not as easy to close.
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of garbage. We had it professionally installed by our home improvement guy, and he had to reinforce it in a few places because it was so flimsy. The gate also is the worst to close and takes a minute of lining it up so that it clicks closed. This is my first Summer Infant product. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: kcs

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed that the product was easy to assemble and works AMAZING...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 weeks until my 18 month old learned ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 weeks until my 18 month old learned how to open the gate...now its sitting in my garage because it became more of a nuisance and hindrance than anything else. Now that she has access to the kitchen she makes breakfast for me so I'm ok with it...
customer_reviews.author: Philip B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for large opening
customer_reviews.text: Great for wide openings. My only dislike is when one side isnt extended all the way, the mesh panel has alot of slack in it. My baby like to step into the slack while holding on and has lost his balance a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dogs, love it, it’s tall enough to keep them where I want them and strong enough to stay if they jump! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: dcuriel33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wide Openings
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate system. The gate is easy to open with one hand and swings in or out. It fit the wide opening to our kitchen area with extra length left over. It was easy to install and has helped up well against a crawler and three dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item so much, we live in an apartment and have a dog whom sheds when he shakes and this blocks off our nursery area so well!! The mesh fabric keeps all the unwanted hair out and my husband said it was easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: TaLynn Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This gate works great for keeping my dogs out of the livingroom when their paws are wet from outside, definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Difficult latching system
customer_reviews.text: With two puppies, we've tried about every gate system available. The magnetic closing system in this gate fastens securely, but is not as easy to open or close as I would like. I prefer something that I can easily work without having to stop, look at, and manipulate every time. This took me several tries each time to open and re-latch the gate - much too difficult for a gate I use continually.
customer_reviews.author: Mad4Terriers

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive large gate for wide hallways
customer_reviews.text: This gate works wonderfully. It was very easy to install. It keeps my toddler out of the kitchen but is easy enough to open for my 6 year old to get through. For the price, this is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the gray color and that you have options to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the gray color and that you have options to make it fit your space. We only have the door and one panel up it still works great. It was very simple to install and secure to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: LadyVasas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: One of the connectors (plastic screw) stripped so we had to use a carriage bolt to hold it together but now it is solid and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Neutron SD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great for us and we have 2 toddlers ages 2/1 they’re rough little buggers lol and its still holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: No not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea on paper alone. 1 it is not tall enough, 2 it is easily climbed over, 3 a piece broke while installing and 3 screws striped out while installing. (I was using hand tools) It simply is not sturdy enough. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Alen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gate
customer_reviews.text: This gate is perfect. Needed it for a very big opening and it was exactly what I needed. Just ordered another one for another spot in the house. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball mom

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.......
customer_reviews.text: I expect this item to break within a few days......not built very durable at all. Easy enough to install so at least it won’t too hard when the time comes. 🤷‍♂️ I’ll be looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my grandson safe!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were clear and instillation was easy. Our trim got in the way but we made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Wagshouse

customer_reviews.title: Broken, but unable to return.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this anticipating when my baby would start crawling and walking. So he finally did start go stand so we went to set it up and it appears to be broken, the latch is broke and the plastic cover missing, exposing spring. Since I waited too long I can't return it. Just be aware that things may be broken when sent to you.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all happy with this product. It will not stay in place. I installed it according to the instructions and tightened it down but gate still moves across the floor. Must not be made for carpeted areas.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Love this gate
customer_reviews.text: Love this gate! Does move can’t adjust as tight as needed but fits my area good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and not stable, kids can easily break it and push it even when it’s tightly screwed, and the gat’s lock is broken as shown in the picture, will be returning it, just spend little extra and get a durable gate
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: Good gate with annoying door
customer_reviews.text: The open/close mechanism is jankity compared to other gates, but the mesh style and ease of taking apart all three sections it quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Flexible in using the gate.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be configured to different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and frustration
customer_reviews.text: Kicked my ass trying to bolt to the wall but after finally getting it, it’s holding up against 2 one year olds!
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great gate for large openings
customer_reviews.text: This gate is excellent for large spaces. We have an oddly angled space we needed to block our son into and it works great. My only complaint is that the gate has come a bit loose but I also have 2 older kids that climb over it so it gets a lot of abuse. I would absolutely recommend this gate to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby gate. It looks much more contemporary than the traditional barred gates and does a great job keeping our twin toddlers in their playroom. It's very easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: This works fantastic to keep our very active little girl where she ...
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastic to keep our very active little girl where she needs to be and out of everything, which then allows me to keep my sanity and keeps me from having to clean up the contents of every drawer and cupboard in the house. It was easy to install and does the job we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Marks

product_meta.title: Summer Custom Fit Walk-Thru Extra Wide Baby Gate, Stylish Grey Mesh – 30” Tall, Fits Openings up 65” – 87” (2 Panels) or 87” – 141” (3 Panels), Baby and Pet Gate for Doorways
product_meta.description:
Protect baby without sacrificing style with the Summer Infant Custom Fit Gate. Made from quality materials, this stylish, extra wide gate, adjusts to 143" wide, allowing parents to configure in odd shaped spaces, extra wide openings and even creating play areas in corners of the home. Do not use on uneven surfaces

BRAND STORY
By Summer Infant
feature_bullets: EXTRA WIDE: The Summer Custom Fit Walk-Thru Gate for Baby is perfect for extra-wide doorways, wide spaces, or for a free standing playard. The 30” tall gate fits extra wide openings from 65” – 87” (2 panels) or 87” – 141” (3 panels).
EASY INSTALLATION: . The hardware mounted installation keeps gate securely in place. Tools are required for hardware mounting.
ONE HAND WALK-THRU: However you decide to configure this customizable baby gate, the simple, one-handed walk-thru door allows parents to move easily from room to room for ultimate convenience.

CUSTOMIZABLE AND SECURE: Configure the gate in odd shaped spaces, extra wide openings or create play areas in corners of the home. Have peace of mind knowing your baby or pet can explore safely with this high-quality baby gate from Summer.
STYLISH BABY GATE: This decorative baby gate is designed with a stylish grey mesh so you can child proof your home in style. Standing 30” tall, it is ideal for use with toddlers and small pets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars601 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
